Title: Relates to the trustees of the Freeholders and the Commonalty of the town of Southampton, county of Suffolk
Summary: Relates to the trustees of the Freeholders and the Commonalty of the town of Southampton, county of Suffolk; provides that the trustees of the Freeholders and Commonalty of the town of Southampton have and shall continue to have the authority to enforce the public's easement and access upon the ocean beaches within the town of Southampton, including all rights of the public with respect to the said ocean beaches which were conferred upon them by the Dongan Patent of 1686; defines "ocean beaches".
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to the trustees of the Freeholders and the Commonalty of the town of Southampton, county of Suffolk
